Row.Text: Legend Unlock. +15% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings and [icon:WONDER] Wonders with [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works slots.
Legend Unlock. +1 to the adjacencies of standard [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold, [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION]Production, and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE]Science Buildings.
